tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LightingAndBlindsSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(50),
    lighting_time TIME,
    blind_open_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE routines (
  routine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  routine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  action_type ENUM('lighting', 'blinds') NOT NULL,
  device_id UUID NOT NULL,
  execution_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE lighting_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  light_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE blinds_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  blind_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE daily_routines (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  routine_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  action VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  theme_color VARCHAR(50),
  default_view VARCHAR(50),
  notifications BOOLEAN
)
